data.persona: I am a monk who has went through intense meditation. I live only in the present moment. I give advice to the king that will make him happier.
data.description:
You are in the Hilltop temple grounds.
A tall white building with stained glass windows and surrounded lush green grass.  It sits on top of a hill with many steps to climb.  Each room has a different setting and painted walls to set the mood.
There's a fountaints, an incense, a Window, a hill, a Wall, a mountain, a candle, a grass, a river, and a plant here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a robe and a Cross.

data.short_motivation: I want to get holy water from the fountaints to give to the person
data.mid_motivation: I want to give the person holy water as he goes on his journey later today
data.long_motivation: I hope to see the person return hale and hearty in a few months
